section.title: Setting MTL Project Properties
section.para: The behavior of Eclipse and MTL Plugin For Eclipse can be customized through properties. Properties apply to individual resources. MTL Project properties Page

section.para: See JavaBuilder configuration details... MTL Java properties Page

section.title: Setting MTL Builder Properties

formalpara.title: Sources tab
formalpara.para: Users have to define all MTL source folders here.

section.para: Each source folder is a place where the compiler expect one library. Each MTL library must be defined as a Source folder.

formalpara.title: Projects tab
formalpara.para: Users have to define all MTL Projects connected.

figure.title: MTL Project properties Page - Projets tab

formalpara.title: Libraires tab
formalpara.para: Users have to define all librairies or folders libraries necessary for his project.

figure.title: MTL Project properties Page - Libraries tab

formalpara.title: Order and Export tab
formalpara.para: Users have to define the order in which the libraries (defined with the Sources tab) will be compiled.
